message.content:
{
  "structured": {
    "name": "Sherouk Mohammed Ibrahim",
    "contact": {
      "email": "Sheroukk87@gmail.com",
      "phone": "01100144313",
      "linkedin": "http://linkedin.com/in/sherouk-mohamed-a659491b8",
      "github": null,
      "portfolio": null
    },
    "location": {
      "city": "Cairo, Nasr City",
      "country": "Egypt"
    },
    "current_title": "Recruitment Specialist",
    "total_experience_years": null,
    "education": [
      {
        "degree": "Bachelor degree of Management Information System",
        "institution": "El Shorouk Academy",
        "year": 2020
      },
      {
        "degree": "Advanced HR diploma",
        "institution": "Arab Academy for Science Technology & Martin Transport (AAST)",
        "year": 2021
      },
      {
        "degree": "Masters of business administration (MBA)",
        "institution": "Helwan University",
        "year": null
      }
    ],
    "experience": [
      {
        "title": "ICT teacher and Admin Assistant",
        "company": null,
        "start_year": 2020,
        "end_year": 2021,
        "highlights": [
          "Creating and distributing educational content.",
          "Plan and execute educational in-class and outdoor activities and events.",
          "Provide individualized instruction to each student by promoting interactive learning.",
          "Develop curriculum to meet developmental goals and instructional activities.",
          "Exercise open and respectful communication with families, coworkers, supervisors, and other school staff."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Academic Coordinator and Stages Deputy",
        "company": null,
        "start_year": 2021,
        "end_year": 2022,
        "highlights": [
          "Develop and manage comprehensive academic support program.",
          "Prepare and maintain student records according to district policies and administrative regulations.",
          "Assist in updating lesson content and instruction methodology.",
          "Provide support and guidance to academic trainees.",
          "Monitoring student progress and making appropriate adjustments to ensure academic success.",
          "Creating and updating student records, including course schedules and class rosters.",
          "Reviewing course syllabi to ensure that they are aligned with departmental objectives.",
          "Responsible for planning and organizing new events.",
          "Create, prepare, and deliver reports to various departments.",
          "Develop and maintain a filing system.",
          "Plan meetings and take detailed minutes.",
          "Receive and forward communications to different staff and departments.",
          "Provide assistance to staff, managers, and senior-level officers as needed."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Recruitment Specialist",
        "company": "Pushie Creative Studio",
        "start_year": 2022,
        "end_year": 2023,
        "highlights": [
          "Create and publish job ads in various portals.",
          "Network with potential hires through professional groups on social media and during events.",
          "Screen resumes and job applications.",
          "Conduct initial phone screens to create shortlists of qualified candidates.",
          "Interview candidates in-person for a wide range of roles (junior, senior and executive).",
          "Follow up with candidates throughout the hiring process."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Recruitment Specialist",
        "company": "K Group",
        "start_year": 2023,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Design, distribute and measure the results of candidate experience surveys.",
          "Reports on quarterly and annual hiring plans.",
          "Reports on hiring progress weekly and monthly.",
          "Collaborate with Human Resources Manager to set qualification criteria for future employees."
        ]
      },
      {
        "title": "Recruitment Specialist",
        "company": "Mcon for tourism investment (F&B)",
        "start_year": 2024,
        "end_year": "Present",
        "highlights": [
          "Create and publish job ads in various portals.",
          "Network with potential hires through professional groups on social media and during events.",
          "Screen resumes and job applications.",
          "Conduct initial phone screens to create shortlists of qualified candidates.",
          "Interview candidates in-person for a wide range of roles (junior, senior and executive).",
          "Follow up with candidates throughout the hiring process.",
          "Track recruitment metrics including time-to-hire, time-to-fill, and source of hire.",
          "Maintain a database of potential candidates for future job openings."
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "Computer skills",
      "Strong communication skills",
      "Fast learning",
      "Ability to organize and manage time",
      "Self-motivated",
      "Flexible and open to change",
      "Problem Solving",
      "Ability to organize & make decision"
    ],
    "tools": [],
    "certifications": [],
    "languages": [
      "English",
      "Arabic"
    ],
    "projects": []
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 18,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 2,
      "experience_impact": 2,
      "performance_productivity": 3,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 2,
      "leadership_collaboration": 4,
      "education_certifications": 5,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "entry_level",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Native Arabic and strong communication skills indicated; aligns with language requirement.",
        "Demonstrated experience in structured processes (screening, interviewing, reporting, metrics tracking).",
        "Ongoing MBA suggests continued professional development."
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "No explicit full stack development experience or production web application delivery mentioned.",
        "None of the required technical skills are listed (React, Next, Nest, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MERN/PERN, SQL, NoSQL).",
        "No evidence of backend API design, authentication/authorization, secure coding, testing, CI/CD, Docker, or cloud deployment.",
        "Location is Cairo, Egypt; does not meet the stated preference to be based in England/Europe."
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The resume describes HR/recruitment and academic coordination experience, with no stated software engineering skills or full stack development background required for the role. While Arabic language requirement is met, core technical and location requirements are not evidenced.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "Recruitment Specialist",
      "Talent Acquisition Specialist",
      "HR Specialist",
      "HR Coordinator",
      "Academic Coordinator"
    ]
  }
}
